name: Apple Ram Ranch
description:
Game Made by a bunch of college students with zero game development experience.

Controls: WASD for movement.

Left Click to throw the apple while in hand.

E to return the apple to your hand.

Space to jump AND launch the goat at you.

R to spawn the goat at the nearest goat respawn location.

Esc to show the menu.

The objective is to ascend the islands and place the golden apple in the cup at the top. The goat will jump at you whenever you jump and are holding the apple, but will follow the apple as long as it is still on the ground. Getting hit by the goat will launch you a distance depending on how far you were from it.

TIP: Letting the goat run at you while the apple is on the ground will send you flying f a r.
